description:
Microsoft Powerpoint 2010 provides entrepreneurs, small business owners as well as corporate staff the platform to effectively communicate messaging. Think of Powerpoint as a 'paint canvas' of sorts which allows you to use colors, images and words to present an idea which needs the viewer's buy-in.

Powerpoint, above every other consideration, must communicate a designers personality in a way which engages audiences from beginning to end.

In this course, students will benefit through learning the following;

  1. Basics of Powerpoint canvas set-up and functionality
  2. Easy-to-understand formatting ideas and best best practices
  3. How to from idea to an engaging presentation
  4. Where to find high definition assets to increase trust with viewers
  5. Adding videos, text and images to increase sales

and many more tips, tools and best practices!

Whether 1, 2 or 3 dimensional design, Powerpoint is easily mastered with the correct training, offered here so join us today!
title: 2010 Microsoft Powerpoint
